_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive
author: support@pterodactyl.io
description: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is a multiplayer first-person shooter video game developed by Hidden Path Entertainment and Valve Corporation.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# steamcmd Base Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

## just in case someone removed the defaults.
if [ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]; then
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
fi

## download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps # Fix steamcmd disk write error when this folder is missing
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

## install game using steamcmd
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} ${EXTRA_FLAGS} +quit ## other flags may be needed depending on install. looking at you cs 1.6

## set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

# -------------
# ADDED INSTALL
# -------------

# dowloading some cfg files for the server
cd /mnt/server/csgo/cfg/
curl -sSL -o server.cfg https://github.com/Mashlex/CSGO-Server-Configs/blob/b4ea7add68ee4698876b309cb1678622c79ba54d/server.cfg
echo "Server config have been written!"
echo 
curl -sSL -o gamemode_armsrace_server.cfg https://github.com/Mashlex/CSGO-Server-Configs/blob/b4ea7add68ee4698876b309cb1678622c79ba54d/gamemodes_server/gamemode_armsrace_server.cfg
curl -sSL -o gamemode_casual_server.cfg https://github.com/Mashlex/CSGO-Server-Configs/blob/b4ea7add68ee4698876b309cb1678622c79ba54d/gamemodes_server/gamemode_casual_server.cfg
curl -sSL -o gamemode_competitive2v2_offline_server.cfg https://github.com/Mashlex/CSGO-Server-Configs/blob/b4ea7add68ee4698876b309cb1678622c79ba54d/gamemodes_server/gamemode_competitive2v2_offline_server.cfg
curl -sSL -o gamemode_competitive2v2_server.cfg https://github.com/Mashlex/CSGO-Server-Configs/blob/b4ea7add68ee4698876b309cb1678622c79ba54d/gamemodes_server/gamemode_competitive2v2_server.cfg
curl -sSL -o gamemode_competitive_offline_server.cfg https://github.com/Mashlex/CSGO-Server-Configs/blob/b4ea7add68ee4698876b309cb1678622c79ba54d/gamemodes_server/gamemode_competitive_offline_server.cfg
echo "Gamemode Configs have been written!(PART 1/4)"

curl -sSL -o gamemode_competitive_server.cfg https://github.com/Mashlex/CSGO-Server-Configs/blob/b4ea7add68ee4698876b309cb1678622c79ba54d/gamemodes_server/gamemode_competitive_server.cfg
curl -sSL -o gamemode_competitive_short_server.cfg https://github.com/Mashlex/CSGO-Server-Configs/blob/b4ea7add68ee4698876b309cb1678622c79ba54d/gamemodes_server/gamemode_competitive_short_server.cfg
curl -sSL -o gamemode_cooperative_server.cfg https://github.com/Mashlex/CSGO-Server-Configs/blob/b4ea7add68ee4698876b309cb1678622c79ba54d/gamemodes_server/gamemode_cooperative_server.cfg
curl -sSL -o gamemode_coopmission_server.cfg https://github.com/Mashlex/CSGO-Server-Configs/blob/b4ea7add68ee4698876b309cb1678622c79ba54d/gamemodes_server/gamemode_coopmission_server.cfg
curl -sSL -o gamemode_custom_server.cfg https://github.com/Mashlex/CSGO-Server-Configs/blob/b4ea7add68ee4698876b309cb1678622c79ba54d/gamemodes_server/gamemode_custom_server.cfg
echo "Gamemode Configs have been written!(PART 2/4)"

curl -sSL -o gamemode_deathmatch_short_server.cfg https://github.com/Mashlex/CSGO-Server-Configs/blob/b4ea7add68ee4698876b309cb1678622c79ba54d/gamemodes_server/gamemode_deathmatch_short_server.cfg
curl -sSL -o gamemode_deathmatch_tmm_server.cfg https://github.com/Mashlex/CSGO-Server-Configs/blob/b4ea7add68ee4698876b309cb1678622c79ba54d/gamemodes_server/gamemode_deathmatch_tmm_server.cfg
curl -sSL -o gamemode_demolition_server.cfg https://github.com/Mashlex/CSGO-Server-Configs/blob/b4ea7add68ee4698876b309cb1678622c79ba54d/gamemodes_server/gamemode_demolition_server.cfg
curl -sSL -o gamemode_dm_freeforall_server.cfg https://github.com/Mashlex/CSGO-Server-Configs/blob/b4ea7add68ee4698876b309cb1678622c79ba54d/gamemodes_server/gamemode_dm_freeforall_server.cfg
curl -sSL -o gamemode_retakecasual_server.cfg https://github.com/Mashlex/CSGO-Server-Configs/blob/b4ea7add68ee4698876b309cb1678622c79ba54d/gamemodes_server/gamemode_retakecasual_server.cfg
echo "Gamemode Configs have been written!(PART 3/4)"

curl -sSL -o gamemode_survival_server.cfg https://github.com/Mashlex/CSGO-Server-Configs/blob/b4ea7add68ee4698876b309cb1678622c79ba54d/gamemodes_server/gamemode_survival_server.cfg
curl -sSL -o gamemode_retakecasual_server.cfg https://github.com/Mashlex/CSGO-Server-Configs/blob/b4ea7add68ee4698876b309cb1678622c79ba54d/gamemodes_server/gamemode_retakecasual_server.cfg
curl -sSL -o gamemode_teamdeathmatch_server.cfg https://github.com/Mashlex/CSGO-Server-Configs/blob/b4ea7add68ee4698876b309cb1678622c79ba54d/gamemodes_server/gamemode_teamdeathmatch_server.cfg
curl -sSL -o gamemode_training_server.cfg https://github.com/Mashlex/CSGO-Server-Configs/blob/b4ea7add68ee4698876b309cb1678622c79ba54d/gamemodes_server/gamemode_training_server.cfg
echo "Gamemode Configs have been written!(PART 4/4)"

echo "---------------------------------"
echo
echo "Configs have been written!"
echo

# Script for Autoupdate
cd /mnt/server/
cat <<EOF > update.txt
// update.txt
//
@ShutdownOnFailedCommand 1 //set to 0 if updating multiple servers at once
@NoPromptForPassword 1
login anonymous 
force_install_dir ../
app_update 740
quit
EOF

echo "update.txt has been written!"
echo

variables.name: Game Server Token
variables.description: The Steam Account Token required for the server to be displayed publicly. https://steamcommunity.com/dev/managegameservers

variables.name: AppID
variables.description: This is the Steam Game ID.

variables.name: Client Port
variables.description:
Serverport + 1 
ADMIN ONLY!

variables.name: GOTV Port
variables.description:
Serverport + 2 
If is this enabled, you can use that port to join the GOTV.

variables.name: VAC Port (Steam)
variables.description:
Serverport + 3 
ADMIN ONLY!

variables.name: Tickrate
variables.description:
The tick rate of the server, according to the possibilities of the order. 64 or 128 are possible. 
ORDER CONFIG!

variables.name: Slots
variables.description:
The amount of players, who can join the server. 
ORDER CONFIG!

variables.name: Servername
variables.description: This is the servername.

variables.name: Server Tags
variables.description: This command sets the server's tags that show in the community server browser. Separate each tag with a comma.

variables.name: Rcon Password
variables.description: Rcon Password to control the Server online. For your security, change the password.

variables.name: Server Password
variables.description: This is the password to join the server. If the field is left empty, you can join the server without a password.

variables.name: Contact E-Mail
variables.description: The contact email of the server admin.

variables.name: Startmap
variables.description: This is the Startmap.

variables.name: Gametype
variables.description:
Select the Gametype and the Gamemode to chance mode , which do you want to play.

Type/Mode: 0/0 Casual | 0/1 Competitive | 0/2 Wingman 2v2 | 0/3 Weapons Expert 5v5 | 1/0 Arms Race | 1/1 Demolition | 1/2 Deathmatch | 2/0 Training  | 3/0 Custom | 4/0 Cooperative | 4/1 Coop Strike | 5/0 Wargames (Skirmish) | 6/0 Danger Zone

variables.name: Gamemode
variables.description:
Select the Gametype and the Gamemode to chance mode , which do you want to play.

Type/Mode: 0/0 Casual | 0/1 Competitive | 0/2 Wingman 2v2 | 0/3 Weapons Expert 5v5 | 1/0 Arms Race | 1/1 Demolition | 1/2 Deathmatch | 2/0 Training  | 3/0 Custom | 4/0 Cooperative | 4/1 Coop Strike | 5/0 Wargames (Skirmish) | 6/0 Danger Zone

variables.name: Skirnish
variables.description:
Added the Skirmish ID, to expand the versions of Gamemode, like FFA.

None Mode: 0 = default |
Casual Mode: 1 = Stab Stab Zap, 3 = Flyingscoutman, 4 = Trigger Discipline, 8 = Heavy Assault Suit, 12 = Retakes |
Deathmatch Mode: 2 = Free For All, 6 = Boom Headshot, 7 = Hunter-Gatherers |
Arms Race: 10 = Arms Race |
Demoliton: 11 = Demoliton

variables.name: HLTV
variables.description: Leave Blank to activate GOTV. ORDER CONFIG!

variables.name: GOTV Name
variables.description: The displayed name when the GOTV is called.

variables.name: GOTV Password
variables.description: This is the password to join the GOTV. If the field is left blank, you can join the GOTV without a password.

variables.name: GOTV Title
variables.description: This is the description of the GOTV stream.

variables.name: GOTV Slots
variables.description:
This is the number of slots that can join the GOTV. 
ORDER CONFIG!

variables.name: API Authentification Key
variables.description:
Key to use the Steam Workshop. https://steamcommunity.com/login/home/?goto=%2Fdev%2Fapikey
You must use the adress of the Gameserver without port.

variables.name: Workshop Collection ID
variables.description: If you want to use workshop items, you need to add the ID of the collection.
